channel.description: Recent content in macos on Some Title

item.title: What to do when (base) is displayed at the beginning of the Mac terminal
item.description: After launching the Mac terminal, The familiar (base) characters at the Anaconda prompt start. By the way, I’ve been using Anaconda lately. (base)username:~$ Cause Since the setting that automatically enables the virtual environment built with Anaconda may be effective, I ran the following command to check. $ conda config --show | grep auto_activate_base Now that we have a True returned, we know we need to change the settings. auto_activate_base: True Environment ãƒ»MacOS Catalina 10.
